About Us - Call Us Today: 386-736-6175 info@whisperwooddeland.com 3070 Whisper Boulevard, DeLand, FL 32724 Home About Us Veterans Plaza Golf Course Gallery Calendar Resident Information Contact Us About Us Whisperwood is a 55+ community that caters to the needs of a wide variety of people looking to live a comfortable adult lifestyle. The beautifully decorated clubhouse has a British West Indies theme and provides a landscaped resort atmosphere to enjoy while you listen to soothing music and relax in the sun. If the sun isn’t your cup of tea you can grab a book from the library, kick back, take your shoes off and sit under the covered patio by our 2 swimming pools. Billiard table Poker tables Lighted tennis and pickle ball court Lighted shuffleboard courts 9-hole pitch & putt golf course Large banquet room with solid red oak dance floor Library Swimming pools Bocce ball courts Pickle Ball Beautiful decorated clubhouse Fully equipped commercial kitchen for resident's use Besides the amenities at Whisperwood we also have a wide selection of groups and clubs you can join to expand your friendships and fun. Check out our activity calendar. Groups and Clubs: Craft Club Men's/Women's/Co-ed golf leagues Chair exercise class Summer water aerobics Shuffleboard League Tennis Club / Pickle Ball Singles Group Dining Pinochle Club and many more activities Quilting Club Exercise Class Whisper Slims Club Bocce Ball League Bridge Club Social Happy Hour Poker Clubs Bunco 3070 Whisper Boulevard, DeLand, FL ​32724 info@whisperwooddeland.com 386-736-6175

          lot rent, or any dues/fees associated with the community or home. Additional fees for certain amenity privileges may apply.
          All applicable community fees are the responsibility of the buyer to obtain and community manager/owner to disclose prior to ownership or occupancy. Description Whisperwood Manufactured Home Park is an age-restricted (55+) manufactured home community located in 3070 Whisper Blvd, DeLand, FL 32724. Whisperwood Manufactured Home Park is a land-lease community was built in 1988. and has a total of 396 home sites. Home site lot rent ranges from $595 - $722 per month and includes the following: Trash pickup Water Sewer The streets in the community are paved, and are of an average street width. The water in the community is sourced from the city and the sewer system is city provided. Parking is off-street The community has 0 parking spaces available for RVs. Managed on-site by ROC (Resident Owned Co-Op). Whisperwood Manufactured Home Park is an affordable housing choice for active, friendly, age-qualified living. This well-maintained retirement community has easy access to local recreation, shopping and entertainment. Equal Housing Opportunity Amenities check Clubhouse check Recreation facilities check Swimming pool check WiFi Local Climate HOT-HUMID Whisperwood Manufactured Home Park is located in Climate Zone 1.
      A HOT-HUMID climate is defined as a region that receives more than 20 inches (50 cm) of annual precipitation, and where the monthly average outdoor temperature remains above 67°F (19.5°C) throughout the year. Knowing your area’s climate zone (as assigned by the U.S. Department of Energy’s Building America Program into one of eight zones), can help you predict your heating and cooling needs. Humidity and temperature can of course vary, even by county. The Building America HOT-HUMID climate zone corresponds to the portions of IECC zones 2 and 3 in the dry category. Full of activities and top-notch amenities, including two pools, Jack Nicklaus Golden Bear 9-hole Pitch & Putt, lakes, Veterans Memorial, shuffleboard, bocce ball, and tennis courts. The community clubhouse has a large ballroom with views of the semi-tropical landscape and lake with fountains, a library, card and billiards room. PARK AMENITIES Billiards, Bocce, Clubhouse, Clubhouse WiFi, GolfCourse, Horseshoes, Internet, Library, Motorcycles Allowed, Off-Street Parking, Pets Allowed, Planned Activities, Pool, Rentals Allowed, RV/Boat Storage, Shuffleboard, Tennis Park Type Senior Lot Rent $850-$944 Monthly Rent Includes Lawn | Irrigation | Trash | Cable This information is believed to be correct, but not warranted. Whispering Pines Ligonier | Homes Starting at $31,999 Home Communities Our Communities Bayview Eagle’s Nest Mill Pond Oakwood Pheasant Run Quail Ridge Tallgrass Tallgrass Enclave Whispering Pines About About Us Blog COMMUNITY EVENTS Employment Employment Application FR Cares Promotions Investor Relations Resident Feedback Form Contact Apply for Financing Resident Log In Whispering Pines  | 700 Lincolnway West Ligonier, IN 46767 (260) 215-4767 Welcome to Apply To Rent Apply To Finance About Whispering Pines Our Homes Amenities (260) 215-4767 ABOUT Whispering Pines AVAILABLE HOMES STARTING AT $31,999 We have beautiful homes for sale! Financing Available! Apply for credit here for free! Whispering Pines is located in downtown Ligonier, IN, designed to enhance a carefree, active lifestyle. Enjoy your choice of a wide array of homes ranging from 2 to 3 bedrooms for rent or sale. Decide whether you are looking to buy or rent your very own custom home! We are confident that Whispering Pines has a perfect home for you and your family. Visit us today! And don’t forget to check out our other wonderful Ligonier mobile home community , Eagle’s Nest, which is just minutes away from downtown. Or if you prefer a lakeside mobile home in Syracuse, Indiana , our Bayview community can’t be beat. Contact us to schedule a tour or to learn about our active promotions . View Available Homes Schedule a Showing Community Photos Click Photo to Enlarge Available Homes Homesite 11 2013 Redman (260) 215-4767 Contact Us Homesite 18 2017 Adventure 960 sqft. 2 Bedrooms 1 Bathroom $32,999 (260) 215-4767 Contact Us Homesite 25 2017 Redman 1248 sqft. 3 Bedrooms 2 Full Bathrooms $39,999 (260) 215-4767 Contact Us Homesite 28 2013 Forest River 728 sqft. 1 Bedroom 2 Full Bathrooms $29,999 (260) 215-4767 Contact Us Benefits of Living at Whispering Pines Location Whispering Pines is located just a few minutes from the Ligonier, IN industrial park business district, right across from the Ligonier skate park and soccer field. The area is very accessible since five of the six longest highways in the US are within 20 miles of Ligonier; US6, US20, US30, I80, and I90. Our neighborhood is right near Lake Wawasee, so we have access to the beautiful lake as well as a community pool. Amenities The community is maintained for free, with mowing, trimming, and snow removal included. We are also proud to offer our residents reliable on-site maintenance and professional management services. The neighborhood has all new water and electric lines as well, so they will be dependable for years to come! Community Our community is quaint and quiet, with just 28 homesites and enough space to grow. Being just minutes from the city center, there are many town events taking place for our residents to attend around the Whispering Pines community. Our neighborhood also has access to a pool, and to the beautiful Lake Wawasee. We have wonderful schools in the area that provide great education for grades K- 12. The community gives generous support to the schools through numerous grants and partnerships. The after school bus conveniently drops kids off here in the community. Ligonier has also been declared the safest town in the US for the last three years. Local Activities Ligonier is known for its historic buildings and gorgeously painted murals. Ligonier is also home to the only perfumery in the U.S! Annie Oakley tours are available and popular, and a gift shop is open to the public. There are many different parks in Ligonier such as the G. Martin Kenney Memorial Park which opened in 1980. This 40 acre park includes a one-mile walking path, lighted ball diamonds, shuffleboard courts, tennis courts, basketball courts, children’s play area, and picnic pavilions. The Ligonier Public library always has events going on. There are also many restaurants, from food like mom used to make at Fashion Farm, to the “Famous for their Fish ” Charger House. If you’re looking for something with a little more spice, there’s always one of the colorful, authentic Latin-American stores with restaurants inside. Amenities Professional Management Walking distance to city center Exterior Storage Included Full Time Maintenance On Street Parking New water and electric lines Important Community Information: Office Hours: Monday – Friday 9:00 am – 5:00 pm Whispering Pines Office: (260) 215-4767 After Hours Maintenance Emergency: (260) 409-0683 FR Resident Relations: (720) 449-6592 Website/Resident Portal: www.frcommunity.com LOCAL UTILITY & EMERGENCY Police/Fire/Paramedics: 911 Non-Emergency Police: (260) 636-2182 Non-Emergency Fire: (260) 894-3123 Hospital – Goshen: (574) 364-1000 Local Utility Power – REMC: (800) 933-7362 Local Utility Gas – NIPSCO: (800) 464-7726 Poison Control: (800) 222-1222 First Name * Last Name * Email * Phone Comments * Get in Touch We would be happy to answer any questions you may have about the Whispering Pines community as you search for your next home. Get in touch and we’ll help you find a home that fits your lifestyle and budget! Call us at (260) 215-4767 Or Stop in! Come talk to our helpful staff and explore the Whispering Pines community for yourself. 700 Lincolnway West Ligonier, IN 46767 Office Hours: Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm Get Directions Close to everything, a long way from ordinary. Home About Staff Share Our Staff VISIT THE WOODLANDS Visit The Woodlands is comprised of twelve full-time staff members. As the official destination marketing organization, we work to promote The Woodlands as a first-class destination for business, convention and leisure travel. Executive NICK WOLDA President Phone 281-210-3475 As the President of Visit The Woodlands Nick oversees the team who handles tourism, sales and marketing initiatives for The Woodlands, Texas. MORE INFO ELIZABETH EDDINS, CTE, TDM Executive Director Email elizabeth.eddins@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3825 Elizabeth works to identify new opportunities for Visit The Woodlands in addition to assisting with the development of programs and leading daily operations. She implements action plans to encourage visitors, both individual and group, to visit The Woodlands and utilize its accommodations, restaurants, retail shopping, attractions and convention facilities. MORE INFO Marketing ASHLEY WHITE, TDM Director of Marketing Email ashley.white@visitthewoodlands.com Ashley leads the Marketing Department and oversees advertising, brand management, integrated marketing campaigns, public relations and online initiatives for Visit The Woodlands. MORE INFO ANDREA DAY Creative Media Coordinator Email andrea.day@visitthewoodlands.com Andrea manages photography and videography for Visit The Woodlands. She also supports the team with design projects and various marketing initiatives. MORE INFO RACHAEL VARNER Content Coordinator Email rachael.varner@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3478 MORE INFO BROOKLYN NEWELL Social Media Coordinator Email brooklyn.newell@visitthewoodlands.com As the Social Media Coordinator, Brooklyn uses various social media platforms to build authentic connections between brands and their audiences. MORE INFO Sales JOSIE LEWIS, CMP, CTA Director of Sales Email josie.lewis@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3483 Josie leads the Sales Department for Visit The Woodlands. In this position, Josie oversees all aspects of sales for Visit The Woodlands including sales and servicing efforts, the sales travel schedule, blitz opportunities, FAM events and strategic initiatives. MORE INFO ASHLEY FENNER, CTA Senior Sales Specialist Email ashley.fenner@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3470 Ashley is the Senior Sales Specialist for Visit The Woodlands. Ashley’s role includes sales efforts, FAM events, site tour coordination, and attending tradeshows to promote The Woodlands. Ashley also assists with the incentive fund program while working closely with the Servicing Coordinator to ensure that groups have an exceptional experience while they are in The Woodlands for their meeting, convention or event. MORE INFO RYAN GREENWOOD Senior Sales Specialist Email ryan.greenwood@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3490 Ryan is the Senior Sales Specialist for Visit The Woodlands with a focus on the corporate market and sports market. Ryan’s role includes group lead development, sales efforts, FAM events, site tour coordination, and attending tradeshows to promote The Woodlands to meeting professionals. MORE INFO JULIE QUINN, CTA Servicing Specialist Email julie.quinn@visitthewoodlands.com Phone 281-210-3810 Julie works alongside Meeting Planners that bring meetings and events to The Woodlands. Julie oversees the Servicing Program, that offers complimentary resources to qualified groups including welcome bags and printed collateral for attendees, oversight of the Show Your Badge Program, event welcome booth management, off site venue sourcing coordination, partner event planning and more. MORE INFO Tourism AMBER PARSLEY, TDM, CTA Tourism Specialist Email amber.parsley@visitthewoodlands.com Through a combination of creative programs designed to support local hospitality partners, Amber cultivates strategic partnerships along with leisure tourism initiatives for Visit The Woodlands. Veterans Plaza - Call Us Today: 386-736-6175 info@whisperwooddeland.com 3070 Whisper Boulevard, DeLand, FL 32724 Home About Us Veterans Plaza Golf Course Gallery Calendar Resident Information Contact Us Whisperwood Veterans Plaza Whisperwood Veterans Plaza - In October 2016, Whiperwood residents had a dream to build a Plaza within our community to honor Veterans. This Plaza is the very proud reality of Whisperwood residents coming together, through many meetings, planning, fund raisers of many types and a whole lot of community cohesiveness. The completed Plaza was recognized at a large dedication celebration in April 2018. The residents are still very active in caring for the Plaza, planning and carrying out two special annual celebrations, Memorial Day and Veterans Day, to honor Veterans and all their Supporters. There is also a small ceremony on July 4th and a Golf Cart Parade. All residents, veterans and non-veterans, are invited to come to our periodic meetings and participate at will. Please take a moment out of you busy day to walk around the Plaza, read the bricks, touch the monument and to take time to sit and reflect on the essence of this magnificent Whisperwood Veterans Plaza. Flag Etiquette - Whisperwood Residents volunteer and care for the flags at the Veterans Plaza and at the Park entrance. Residents volunteer to be a monthly Flag Etiquette Captain. Captains are needed throughout the year. If you have any questions or would like to help with this, please contact Bill Felton @ 585.760.9090. Bricks - These bricks are surrounding the Veterans Plaza and have been donated by many veterans and veterans' families. Bricks can be requested and are available for any homeowner or family member who is a military veteran. The request forms are located on the bulletin board in the Clubhouse Library. If you have any questions, please call Bill Felton @ 585.760.9090. Veterans - If you are a military veteran of any branch, or know of a resident veteran, please contact Bill Felton @ 585.760.9090 or Ester Charbono @ 286.822.9791. Whisperwood Veterans White T-Shirts - If you are a veteran and are a homeowner in Whisperwood, you can get your first Whisperwood Veterans White T-Shirt for free. Please contact Terry Smith @ 386.738.5287 or Sandy Simoneau @ 286.822.9791. DVD of the Development of the Whisperwood Veterans Plaza - A DVD was developed which contains many pictures at different phases throughout the planning, development, and construction of this Whisperwood Veterans Plaza. It is really something to sit and watch this develop into a reality. This DVD is free to each military veteran who is a homeowner in Whisperwood Park and is available to anyone else who would like the DVD for a $5.00 donation. Just call Esther Charbono @ 386.738.3971. Plaza Shirts - A subcommittee is currently in the planning phase for developing, obtaining and distributing these Veterans Plaza Shirts. Keep watching Chatterbox as more information will be coming. 3070 Whisper Boulevard, DeLand, FL ​32724 info@whisperwooddeland.com 386-736-6175
